PARAMETER.NAME: FS_DEFAULT_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[]) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_TRACKER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop1[])) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop2[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_JOBHISTORY_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop2[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop2[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_STAGING_DIRECTORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop2[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: THRIFT_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHCatalog[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])) AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER') AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_DATANODE_HOSTNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false') AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportUseDatanodeHostname[]) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: WEBHCAT_HOST
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WEBHCAT_PORT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WEBHCAT_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: STATUSDIR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: HDINSIGHT_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: HDINSIGHT_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WASB_HOST
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WASB_CONTAINER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WASB_USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: WASB_PASSWORD
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: REMOTE_FOLDER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[])

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[]) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_HBASEMASTER_KERBEROS
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Hbase kerberos settings are required only when the Load/Store function is set to HBaseStorage.

PARAMETER.NAME: USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='true') OR (LOCAL=='false' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportImpersonation[]) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')) AND ((isShow[USE_KRB] AND (USE_KRB=='false')) OR (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'))) AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate'))

PARAMETER.NAME: INPUT_FILENAME
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (S3_LOCATION_LOAD == 'true') OR ((LOCAL == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHCatalog[]) AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER') OR ((LOAD=='HBASESTORAGE') AND ((LOCAL=='true') OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHBase[]))

PARAMETER.NAME: DATABASE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHCatalog[]) AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHCatalog[]) AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the execution server.

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportHCatalog[]) AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER' AND DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].isHadoop2[]))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND (!DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] OR USE_KRB=='false')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (isShow[CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH] AND CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportKerberos[] AND USE_KRB=='true')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (isShow[CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH] AND CONFIGURATIONS_FROM_CLASSPATH=='false')

((LOCAL == 'false' AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[] AND ENGINE == 'MAPREDUCE') OR !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[])) AND LOAD=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

((LOCAL == 'false' AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[] AND ENGINE == 'MAPREDUCE') OR !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[])) AND LOAD=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND (PIG_VERSION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_2') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

((LOCAL == 'false' AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[] AND ENGINE == 'MAPREDUCE') OR !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[])) AND LOAD=='RCFILEPIGSTORAGE') AND (PIG_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: piggybank.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL == 'false') AND (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[]) AND (LOAD=='AVROSTORAGE') AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'HORTONWORKS') AND ((PIG_VERSION == 'HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'HDP_1_3'))) AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'MAPR') AND ((PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR310'))) AND (DISTRIBUTION == 'APACHE') AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'AMAZON_EMR') AND ((PIG_VERSION == 'APACHE_2_4_0_EMR') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'APACHE_1_0_3_EMR')))

IMPORT.NAME: piggybank-cdh4.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((LOCAL == 'false') AND (LOAD=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: commons-io
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((LOCAL == 'false') AND (LOAD=='AVROSTORAGE') AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: avro-1.5.4.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND LOAD=='AVROSTORAGE' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[]) AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_4')) AND (PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_2') AND (PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_1') AND (PIG_VERSION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT_3_2') AND (PIG_VERSION!='MAPR401' OR PIG_VERSION!='MAPR410') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-pig-bundle-1.3.2
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND LOAD=='PARQUETLOADER' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportOldImportMode[] AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_4' AND PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1' AND PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' AND PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5'))

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-pig-bundle-1.2.5-cdh5.1.3
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND LOAD=='PARQUETLOADER' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1'))

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-pig-bundle-1.5.0-cdh5.4.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((LOCAL == 'false' AND ((DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[] AND ENGINE == 'MAPREDUCE') OR !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, PIG_VERSION].doSupportTezForPig[])) AND LOAD=='PARQUETLOADER' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_4')
